Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Trilogy One offers occupiers a range of available sizes ready for immediate occupation. Boasting a mix of open plan and suites with high quality fit out.Â Trilogy Business Park at Eurocentral is an established business destination located between Glasgow and Edinburgh. The Park benefits from its unrivalled accessibility for the 3.3 million people that live between Glasgow and Edinburgh due to its adjacency to the M8 motorway.

Coltness House is located in Strathclyde Business Park, widely regarded as the best business park location in Scotland. The park is extremely well located for public transport links and is situated in the golden triangle of the M8, M74 and M80. The park is set within mature parkland and benefits from a number of on-site amenities including 2 restaurants, a convenience store, a gym, Hilton Hotel and a hairdresser.Â Coltness House is a modern, standalone office pavilion located in Strathclyde Business Park. The building provides flexible, open planÂ floor plates.
